questions.question: In a system with a 16 KB page size and a 24-bit virtual address space, how many pages can the system support?
If the access time with cache is 25 ns and without cache is 125 ns, and the cache access time is 20 ns, what is the cache hit ratio?
A process references the pages in the order: 'A, B, C, D, E, F, G, H'. With 3 frames and using the LRU page replacement algorithm, how many page faults occur?
Which of the following is not a valid state for a process in a typical process state model?
What is the main purpose of a Translation Lookaside Buffer (TLB) in a memory management unit?

options.A: To speed up the translation of virtual addresses to physical addresses
options.B: To increase the size of physical memory
options.D: To maintain a list of free memory blocks

questions.question: What is the main objective of the Two-Phase Locking (2PL) protocol in synchronization?
In process management, what is the main purpose of a barrier?
What is the primary purpose of memory protection in memory management?

options.B: To prevent unauthorized access to memory

questions.question: In CPU scheduling, what is the primary goal of the Lottery Scheduling algorithm?
What is the primary function of a direct block in file management?

options.C: To track file location on disk

questions.question: In the context of deadlock detection, what is the primary purpose of the Wait-Die and Wound-Wait protocols?
What is the primary objective of the Disk Striping with Parity (RAID 5) technique in disk management?
In process synchronization, what is the main goal of a reader-writer lock?

options.B: Allow multiple readers to access data simultaneously

questions.question: What is the main purpose of the Index Node (i-node) in file management?
In memory management, what is the primary role of the Memory Protection Unit (MPU)?

options.C: To translate virtual addresses to physical addresses

questions.question: What is the primary function of the Wait-Die protocol in deadlock management?

options.A: Allow younger processes to request resources
options.B: Allow older processes to request resources

questions.question: In CPU scheduling, what is the main goal of the Weighted Fair Queuing (WFQ) algorithm?
What is the primary purpose of a shared memory segment in inter-process communication?

options.D: To allow processes to share data

questions.question: In memory management, what is the main goal of address translation using a segment table?

options.C: To translate virtual addresses to physical addresses

questions.question: What is the primary function of a distributed file system in file management?

options.D: To provide access to remote files
